channel.title: CVE Feed for Jun-He Technology Ltd. -- ERP POS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jun-He Technology Ltd. -- ERP POS

item.title: CVE-2021-30171|2024-08-03T22:24:59.598Z -- jun-he%20technology%20ltd. -- erp%20pos
item.description: Special characters of ERP POS news page are not filtered in users’ input, which allow remote authenticated attackers can inject malicious JavaScript and carry out stored XSS (Stored Cross-site scripting) attacks, additionally access and manipulate customer’s information.

item.title: CVE-2021-30170|2024-08-03T22:24:59.555Z -- jun-he%20technology%20ltd. -- erp%20pos
item.description: Special characters of ERP POS customer profile page are not filtered in users’ input, which allow remote authenticated attackers can inject malicious JavaScript and carry out stored XSS (Stored Cross-site scripting) attacks, additionally access and manipulate customer’s information.
